data.text: Salonyi nde bulama nɛ Yisayi bɔnsɔɛ ma,
Alatala Xaxili goroma nɛ a ma,
A sɛɛwama nɛ Alatala xa yaragaaxui kui.
A misikiinɛe makiitima nɛ tinxinyi ra,
A fe birin nabama tinxinyi nan na,
Na lɔxɔɛ, wulai bare nun yɛxɛɛ luma nɛ yire keren,
Ninge nun baratɛ e dɛ madonma nɛ yire keren,
Na lɔxɔɛ diyɔrɛ berema nɛ tanbalunbe ra,
Fe xɔrɔxɔɛ yo mu sɔtɔma n tan Alatala xa geya sɛniyɛnxi fari,
Na lɔxɔɛ, Yisayi bɔnsɔɛ findima tɔnxuma nan na si birin bɛ,
Na lɔxɔɛ, Alatala man a xɔnyɛ italama nɛ
A tɔnxuma masenma nɛ si birin bɛ.
Efirami bɔnsɔɛ xa tɔɔnɛ ɲɔnma nɛ,
E lanma nɛ Filisitakae gerefe ma sogetede mabiri,
Alatala baa itaxun nɛ a xa ɲama bɛ e to keli Misira bɔxi ma.
Alatala kira fima nɛ a xa ɲama dɔnxɔɛ ma,
